titleStmt.title: A defence of A treatise against superstitious Iesu-worship, falsely called scandalous, against the truely scandalous answer of the parson of Westminston in Sussex. Wherein also the whole structure of his Antiteichisma, so farre as it concernes the po[i]nt in controversie is overthrowne, the truth more fully cleared, and the iniquitie of that superstition more throughly detected. By M.G. the author of the former treatise, published Anno Dom. 1642
titleStmt.author: Giles, Mascall, 1595 or 6-1652.

publicationStmt.publisher: for Daniel Frere, and are to be sold at his Shop at the signe of the red Ball in Little-Britaine,

notesStmt.note: reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his Shop at the signe of the red Ball in Little-Britaine
